org.drooms.api

Interface Playground


  • public interface Playground
    Represents a playing field for the worms as a graph of Nodes and Edges.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Graph<Node,Edge> getGraph()
      Return the playing field as a graph.
      int getHeight()
      Return the height of the playing field.
      String getName()
      Return the playground name.
      List<Node> getStartingPositions()
      Returns Nodes at which Players are allowed to start out from.
      int getWidth()
      Return the width of the playing field.
      boolean isAvailable(int x, int y)
      Whether or not a Node is available for a Player's worm to move into without crashing into a wall.

    • Method Detail

      • getGraph

        edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Graph<Node,Edge> getGraph()
        Return the playing field as a graph.
        Returns:
        An unmodifiable graph representing the playing field.

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Return the height of the playing field.
        Returns:
        Of all the nodes in the field, this is the maximum vertical co-ordinate.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Return the playground name.
        Returns:
        String representing the playground.

      • getStartingPositions

        List<Node> getStartingPositions()
        Returns Nodes at which Players are allowed to start out from.
        Returns:
        An unmodifiable list of starting positions.

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Return the width of the playing field.
        Returns:
        Of all the nodes in the field, this is the maximum horizontal co-ordinate.

      • isAvailable

        boolean isAvailable(int x,
                  int y)
        Whether or not a Node is available for a Player's worm to move into without crashing into a wall.
        Parameters:
        x - Horizontal co-ordinate.
        y - Vertical co-ordinate.
        Returns:
        True if available.
